childMarkdownRemark.html:
Greetings all! It’s Spring time, and trees are blooming. It’s time to assess how they did over the winter and make a plan for the coming growing season. While Spring is not the ideal time to prune some trees, many do well and can be addressed. Here is a link to a blog post by Davey Tree, one of the industry leaders in tree care, about pruning in the Spring.

Pruning Trees

Luckily, because of our dry climate, many tree diseases are less common, but if you have any trees that you’re considering pruning or trimming, or have a tree removal that you’re unsure about, please contact us. We are happy to come out and assess the tree and give a recommendation.

Thanks, from Noah’s Park Tree Care.
